about.title: About me
about.someInfo: I’m a software developer because I enjoy creating things that actually work and provide real value. What motivates me most is seeing what an idea can become — from the first thoughts to a finished project. It’s important to me that the result doesn’t just look good, but also works reliably.
about.from: I’m based in the south of Thuringia (Germany). Remote work suits me best, but meetings and coordination directly on-site with a client are a welcome change.
about.toKnowNew: This website is a result of my training as a software developer and shows how much I enjoy learning new things. Next up is the backend part.
about.problemSolvingText: I work in a structured way and I’m patient and persistent — especially when the requirements are clear. I enjoy finding solutions on my own, and at the same time I appreciate having someone to align with or ask when needed.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.show: Across my projects, I use a wide range of technologies — from frontend to API integration.
skills.reveal: I can quickly adapt to new tools and frameworks and I enjoy learning continuously.

privacyPolicy.subtitleB: 2. Hosting, server logs and page view counter
privacyPolicy.boxB:
When you visit this website, the hosting provider may process technically necessary data (server log files). This may include: IP address, date and time of the request, requested page/file, referrer URL, browser type/version, operating system and status codes. This processing is necessary to provide the website, ensure security and stability, and analyze errors.

In addition, a simple page view counter is used that only stores the number of page visits. No user profiles are created and no location data is evaluated.

Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest).
privacyPolicy.subtitleC: 3. Contact form, local storage and your rights
privacyPolicy.boxC:
If you use the contact form, the data you enter (e.g. name, email address, message) is processed solely to handle your request and to contact you. It is not shared with third parties.

This website stores a display preference (e.g. dark/light theme) in your browser’s local storage. No personal data is stored and no tracking is performed.

Under the GDPR, you have rights such as access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability and the right to object. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority.
